#include "commo.h"
#include "../rcc/graph.h"
#include "../rcc/graph_marshaler.h"
#include "../command.h"
#include "../procedure.h"
#include "../command_marshaler.h"
#include "raft_rpc.h"
#include "macros.h"

namespace janus
{

  RaftCommo::RaftCommo(PollMgr *poll) : Communicator(poll)
  {
  }

  shared_ptr<IntEvent>


  RaftCommo::SendRequestVote(parid_t par_id,
                             siteid_t site_id,
                             uint64_t arg1,
                             uint64_t arg2,
                             uint64_t arg3,
                             uint64_t arg4,
                             uint64_t *count)

  {
    /*
     * Example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
     * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
     */
    auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
    auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
    for (auto &p : proxies)
    {
      if (p.first == site_id)
      {


        RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy *)p.second;
        FutureAttr fuattr;
        fuattr.callback = [count, ev](Future *fu)
        {
          /* this is a handler that will be invoked when the RPC returns */
          uint64_t ret1;
          bool_t vote_granted;
          //uint64_t voteCount = *count;
          // uint64_t votesGathered =0;
          /* retrieve RPC return values in order */
          fu->get_reply() >> ret1;
          fu->get_reply() >> vote_granted;
          if (vote_granted)
          {
            // votesGathered+=1;
            //std::cout<<" vote received "<<std::endl;
            ev->Set(1);
            //voteCount+=1;
          }
          /* process the RPC response here */
        };
        /* Always use Call_Async(proxy, RPC name, RPC args..., fuattr)
         * to asynchronously invoke RPCs */
        //std::cout << "sending request vote to: " << site_id << " for the term: " << arg1 << std::endl;
        Call_Async(proxy, RequestVote, arg1, arg2, arg3, arg4, fuattr);
      }
    }
    // std::cout<<" vote count is: "<<*voteCount<<std::endl;
    return ev;
  }
  shared_ptr<IntEvent>
  RaftCommo::SendString(parid_t par_id, siteid_t site_id, uint64_t sender, const string &msg, string *res)
  {
    auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
    auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
    for (auto &p : proxies)
    {
      if (p.first == site_id)
      {
        // std::cout<< "Server is: "<<site_id<<std::endl;
        RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy *)p.second;
        FutureAttr fuattr;
        fuattr.callback = [res, ev](Future *fu)
        {
          fu->get_reply() >> *res;
          ev->Set(1);
        };
        /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
        // std::cout << " sending rpc from: "<< sender<<" to the server: "<<site_id<<std::endl;
        Call_Async(proxy, HelloRpc, msg, fuattr);
      }
    }
    return ev;
  }

  shared_ptr<IntEvent>
  RaftCommo::SendEmptyAppendEntries(parid_t par_id,
                                    siteid_t site_id,
                                    uint64_t leaderTerm,
                                    uint64_t leaderId,
                                    uint64_t leaderIndex,
                                    uint64_t leaderLogTerm,
                                    uint64_t leadersCommit,
                                    uint64_t* term,
                                    bool_t *success)
  {
    auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
    auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
    for (auto &p : proxies)
    {
      if (p.first == site_id)
      {
        // std::cout<< "Server is: "<<site_id<<std::endl;
        RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy *)p.second;
        FutureAttr fuattr;
        fuattr.callback = [term, success, ev](Future *fu)
        {
          fu->get_reply() >> *term;
          fu->get_reply() >> *success;
          if(success)
          {
            ev->Set(1);
          }
        };
        /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
        Call_Async(proxy, EmptyAppendEntries, leaderTerm, leaderId, leaderIndex, leaderLogTerm, leadersCommit, fuattr);
      }
    }
    return ev; 
  }


  shared_ptr<IntEvent>
  RaftCommo::SendAppendEntries(parid_t par_id,
                               siteid_t site_id,
                               uint64_t leaderTerm,
                               uint64_t leaderId,
                               uint64_t prevLogIndex,
                               uint64_t prevLogTerm,
                               shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd,
                               uint64_t leadersCommit,
                               uint64_t* term,
                               bool_t* success)
  { 
    /*
     * More example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
     * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
     */
    auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
    auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
    for (auto &p : proxies)
    {
      if (p.first == site_id)
      {
        RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy *)p.second;
        FutureAttr fuattr;
        fuattr.callback = [term, success, ev](Future *fu)
        {
          // bool_t followerAppendOK;
          // fu->get_reply() >> followerAppendOK;
          fu->get_reply() >> *term;
          fu->get_reply() >> *success;
          if(*success)
          {
            //std::cout<<" success in append "<<std::endl;
            ev->Set(1);
          }        
        };
        //std::cout<< "append status is: "<<*success<<std::endl;
        /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
        MarshallDeputy md(cmd);
        Call_Async(proxy, AppendEntries, leaderTerm, leaderId, prevLogIndex, prevLogTerm, md, leadersCommit, fuattr);
      }
    }
    return ev;
  }
} // namespace janus
